name: Hidden Sense
description:
Explore a military airport, steal secret papers and destroy stuff. It got alot of elements from F.E.A.R., so you may experience paranormal activity, while playing this game.

You can exit the game after finishing all objectives, by standing beside the jet with the lights on and press E.

Warning: This game contains flashing lights. Play with caution.

Known bugs: Muzzle flash on guns only show after spawning them. 

You have to click in the game window to close the quest log

Credits:

Developer: Åsmund Schei

Voice actor: Lara Sluyter

Main menu music: Mattia Cupelli

Gameplay music:  ESN Productions
